message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be invaluable to your business. It's worth at least $1000000 to you, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it. I'm willing to let it go for a price that's mutually beneficial.  Would you be interested in discussing a price of $1050000?  I'm confident this is a fair deal for both of us.
